tachyon.master.journal

Class JournalWriter

  • java.lang.Object
    • tachyon.master.journal.JournalWriter

  • @ThreadSafe
public final class JournalWriter
extends Object
    This class manages all the writes to the journal. Journal writes happen in two phases: 1. First the checkpoint file is written. The checkpoint file contains entries reflecting the state of the master with all of the completed logs applied. 2. Afterwards, entries are appended to log files. The checkpoint file must be written before the log files. The latest state can be reconstructed by reading the checkpoint file, and applying all the completed logs and then the remaining log in progress.

      • completeAllLogs

                     throws IOException

      • getCheckpointOutputStream

        public JournalOutputStream getCheckpointOutputStream(long latestSequenceNumber)
                                              throws IOException
        Returns an output stream for the journal checkpoint. The returned output stream is a singleton for this writer.
        Parameters:
        latestSequenceNumber - the sequence number of the latest journal entry. This sequence number will be used to determine the next sequence numbers for the subsequent journal entries.
        Returns:
        the output stream for the journal checkpoint
        Throws:
        IOException - if an I/O error occurs

      • getEntryOutputStream

        public JournalOutputStream getEntryOutputStream()
                                         throws IOException
        Returns an output stream for the journal entries. The returned output stream is a singleton for this writer.
        Returns:
        the output stream for the journal entries
        Throws:
        IOException - if an I/O error occurs
